website_summaries.verdict: Fun-looking car seat with a full back for comfort and a 3-position headrest.
pros: The Batman character's cape hangs over the edges, which kids will love, and it can detach and double as a blanket
Plenty of polyurethane foam padding throughout the design for comfort
Car seat works for kids weighing 30-100 pounds
cons: Some experience problems with the chest clip on the harness sliding down

customer_reviews.title: Not just a novelty seat!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary before I ordered it thinking it was gimmicky-but knew Amazon would take it back if I didn’t like it. I absolutely love it-maybe more than my 4 year old grandson! It’s large and roomy, very sturdy and I know he is safe. I recommend this product for grandparents like me to keep in their car. A fore warning-you may get startled when you look back-his eyes are intense!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: updated review
customer_reviews.text: We've had this seat for about a year now. My son is 2, 28lbs and about 33 inches tall. Now as a mom I know no parent wants to think about these things but it happens. I was in a car accident with my little guy with me. We were rear ended very hard totaling both vehicles involved. I suffered whiplash but my son was perfectly unharmed. Not even a red mark on him. The seat help up perfectly with no damage. All buckles and the chest plate were still in place and fastened after the accident.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat. Will grow with them.
customer_reviews.text: It takes up quite a bit of room but my kid loves it. Has definitely grown with him. I added extra padding to the seat, we take long trips quite often and I just didn’t feel like the foam piece was soft enough. Other than that we love it. I do how to tell you Batman will catch you off guard and possibly scare the crap out of you when it’s empty and dark. Looks like a real man When you just glance lol
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: On time, exactly as pictured, and my.boys love their car seats:)
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat.when he sleeping his head can rest rather than dangling down.
customer_reviews.author: Faye B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it, yet hate it
customer_reviews.text: Super excited when I got this in the mail for my son, he freaked out too!! Downfall - it's SO hard to buckle in bc there isn't hardly and hand room through the hole. So it strictly stays in the main vehicle. It's also bulky. It's not terribly hard to take apart to clean but time consuming. Since it stays in my car and he doesn't hardly eat/drink in it, it was a well worth purchase for us!
customer_reviews.author: tosha

customer_reviews.title: he had no complaints and was as happy as can be
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson absolutely loves this car seat. We recently took him on a trip where we spent 8 hours on the road, he had no complaints and was as happy as can be. My only complaint is that they should have made the straps thicker. The straps have two sliders that snap into a crotch strap buckle. The sliders can easily reverse position if the strap folds or twists while you're hooking up the buckle. You then have to fold the strap and move the sliders to get them orientated correctly. All in all, a very minor inconvenience when compared to our grandson's happiness and safety.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very thin styrofoam that will fall off and break
customer_reviews.text: We got this car seat July 2017. While moving it this year (July 2019) I heard a cracking sound. When removing the cover for washing, I saw the glue holding the styrofoam had quit working and ALL the styrofoam was falling off. In addition the styrofoam for the head area had broken. This car seat has been used as per the guidelines the manufacturer provided. I am very disappointed and afraid of what would have happened in a crash had I got not taken the car seat out to clean it and found the faulty styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his batman car seat! The design is pretty amazing. The material is comfy, it's not hard like a cheap carseat. It is a little on the big side but we bought it for a truck not a car so it worked out in our favor. It's hard to get the belt through the back if you have big hands. Other than those con's we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan

customer_reviews.title: Was hesitant to buy but so glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: Almost didn't buy because I was hesitant about the safety/quality but I was surprised the safety ratings were good and it is built really well. My husband can install it easy which says a lot because he has big hands and usually gets frustrated putting in carseats. My sons love to ride with daddy because of the batman seat! Big, big hit with the kids. On a side note it can kind of freak you out if you forget it's back there and then all the sudden batman is staring at you. 😬😆
customer_reviews.author: VALVAL

customer_reviews.title: The buckle keeps going underneath my son's bottom. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The buckle keeps going underneath my son's bottom. I had a britax carseat before this one and the buckle was always long enough so that it was hanging and ready to bucle with the chest piece. However with this carseat the bucke is so short that each time my son sits it end up under his bottom and I have to dig it out and it's a hassle and I am also bothering my son. He loves the cup holders but other than that it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Vio

customer_reviews.title: 2nd One! Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Superman for our 2 year old - using 5 point harness, our 5 year wanted one as well! We got him Batman, using just the seat belt - fits him great! Very comfortable! Sturdy cup holders! Even supports his head better, when he'd fall asleep in the car! Highly recommend! Will get a 3rd once daughter is old enough! Great Investment for the cost and came quick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: I’m no superhero, but now my son is.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice car seat! My 4 year old LOVES it! It seems to be very good quality and has latch system and 5 point harness. He’s also able to buckle and unbuckle it himself most of the time. Other seats sometimes have a lap buckle that requires inhuman thumb strength to unlatch. I don’t have an inhuman, I have a 4 year old batman. My only complaint is that I wish this seat’s base could be used as a booster when he outgrows the full seat. But, really, this is still totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who sees it says it's great. Will be using the small blanket in the winter but not sure how much warm it will give it's very thin. The only reason I gave this 4 stars instead of 5 is my ADHD kid who just turned 5 can get out of the seat with no issues. It's a bit concerning since his favorite thing is to be defiant and now he doesn't wait when we stop and gets out of the seat to soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love this car seat it's great it is a little bit bulky, but that's not an issue for me. It did scare me a few times in the morning especially while it's dark looks like somebody staring right at you 🤦🤣😂. I was disappointed my son did not like the cape part he doesn't even use it doesn't even want to be wrapped around it! that could definitely be because of his autism though. Other than that he loves the car seat and it does not scare him.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 3 year old to unbuckle
customer_reviews.text: After having this car seat for a few months my son loves it on the other hand I do not he can easily unbuckle the middle so while we are driving down the road if he drops something or wants something he just unbuckles (OMG) but all and all of he was not able to unbuckle the Seat I would have no complaints it is hard to get the seat belt through the back but most car seats are the same way
customer_reviews.author: Dai

customer_reviews.title: A Must Get
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is a must get..... My son loves it..... It looks amazing, easy to install in the van, seems very durable, head rest had more padding and support than I seen in his other carseat.... We all love it..... I would highly recommend.....
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old son for Christmas. He absolutely loved it! He did complain that his bum hurt on longer car rides as it wasn't as padded on the seat as his other seat. We were in a bad car accident last week. A pick up truck ran into the back of us going 35 mph while we were stopped. My son was completely safe! He didn't have a scratch or bruise on him. The car seat did what it was supposed to. I am very, very pleased with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: D. Adamski

customer_reviews.title: This is the safest car seat for your Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this for my grandson and he loves it too. It is worth the price and the safety ratings are great, love the 5pt harness system and protection from side airbags as all of my vehicles have them! Love the cup holders and everything about this car seat!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: SEMcPherson

customer_reviews.title: Performs as intended and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Works as intended. I've looked back a few times, without grandson in carseat, & yelled at Batman for scarring the heck out of me! Fun & works as intended. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase !
customer_reviews.text: My three year old LOVEs this seat!!! I was not sure if I wanted to buy it for a long time worried it wouldn’t be sturdy and that the whole price was because there was a Batman face on it, I was wrong! Press buy :)
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this seat! The only drawback is that it’s a bit awkward to tighten into the latch system because the booster gets in the way of a good pull. It’s not impossible, just not quite as easy as other chairs. That being said, I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: K. Marlaff

customer_reviews.title: I need help/worth effort
customer_reviews.text: It get one star for Installation and a assemble because I Never had experience with car seats! Widow Woman/50...but my son((TI specialist/25)) assemble & placed it quickly. Grand son loves it!! 5point harness is perfectly comfortable & safe. I would have heard bellowing sounds from an unhappy lil pEr son if it was not good in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Fitimiah Davis

customer_reviews.title: What's no to like
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this car seat and assembling and installing were a breeze. The cape is not meant to be a heavy blanket but is great for those "slight chill in the air" kind of days or just for a comfort blankie for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Jager

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loved the seat
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loved the seat. However, I could never get it to latch tight. In fact the latch system broke after trying to get it right:( I am buying a different car seat because I don't think it's safe.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: My only complaints are that the straps twist easily; and it is a little hard to buckle ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 yo son loves this seat (we all do), we get compliments from people all the time. My only complaints are that the straps twist easily; and it is a little hard to buckle when used in booster mode, with all that stuff getting in the way. It would also be nice if it had higher harness slots,so kids could stay harnessed little longer. But overall, it's a pretty good choice for a combination seat, and I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tynka

customer_reviews.title: He feels like a big boy
customer_reviews.text: Once my son 2, 1/2 year-old received this gift, not wanting to sit in his car seat has not been an issue. He feels like a big boy, loves his HQ seat. He says BatMan is with him sitting down. Sturdy, easy to mount, easy to clean detachable cape. It's a hit with everyone that sees it. Recommend to get a neck pillow for log trips and sleepy camper.
customer_reviews.author: J&Y

customer_reviews.title: Terrible latch system
customer_reviews.text: My kids were so excited to get these car seats. I pulled them out of the box and saw the latch system is different. It sure is a lot easier to get latched and unlatched than the regular kind. But as I am installing this with the latch system, I shake it to the left and right (to make sure it’s tight enough) and the damn thing comes unlatched!!! If I had not checked it and was to get in an accident, my children could have been killed. This is unacceptable. I do not recommend anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Hurst

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend! My son loves his seat! He is a bit taller than a child his age. It's fun & he enjoys getting into the car so he can sit in his batman seat! He has no problem taking a nap while we drive & its easy to wipe clean if he makes messes on it.
customer_reviews.author: CPcola

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and has held up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: OMG this seat is so fantastic we just bought the ninja turtle one as well for my husbands truck! My son no longer fights the car seat and the older kids have been begging us to get them one! Well worth the money and has held up nicely. I like the part that buckles to the frame, it's different from the normal clip and so much easier to get off!
customer_reviews.author: J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I and my grandson love this. It's easy to use and super cute. The only downfall is that when I get ready to leave for work before the sun is fully up, probably 9 times out of 10, it scares the mess out of me when i see it sitting in my car, lol. It looks a lot like a person. Sigh. So then i get a good laugh and then go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Brehm

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: We All Love this.... Only things is, they should make the clips that open the harness easier to open. I cant open it and neither can my kids! Oh and It scares me everytime I get in the car! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Chest clip falls. Not good for carseat safety
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my son. When he came he was one happy little boy. We installed it in my car the same day. I don't drive far for work and he goes with me. Well we went on a trip about 30 mins away and noticed the chest clip had came down. I gave it a few more chances. I completely hate thus carseat and I'm now looking for a new one. The straps always twist and the chest clip does not stay where it should. I'm super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: my four year old loves this car seat it is so nice and sturdy and easy to clip on and off. have been lookign for this product in a number of websites but this one was the cheapest and arrived the fastest!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Safety/versatility
customer_reviews.text: This was the best car seat ever this little boy is enthralled with Batman this could well be the very last car seat we will ever buy
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second KidsEmbrace care seat. And it is all I will continue to buy for my bigger kids. Not only do they love the characters, but they are amazing car seats. So supportive, so safe, and so practical. I can fit 2 well in back seat of truck.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Schott

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd one!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cute and my nephews LOVE them. This one is my second time ordering one. And I know it will not be my last!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Storer

customer_reviews.title: Bat man toddler seat
customer_reviews.text: Buckle is plastic straps get twisted but I found that with most seats grandson loves it ! I’m a grandparent so it’s for quick trips Any lengthy rides I would use his own Chicco convertible car seat capris only in the way it’s not blanket material overall cute car seat for a grandparent or an extra car
customer_reviews.author: Sharon silvestri

customer_reviews.title: Cute and safe car seat
customer_reviews.text: I live this car seat very easy to set up and my son loves it. The only thing I don’t like is when my son falls asleep his head falls forward since car seat does not recline but I knew that considering what kind of car seat it is. But very cute and nice car seat and it’s very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that the little one loves.
customer_reviews.text: This car seat feels well built and has a fair amount of padding. Super simple assemble out of the box dual cup holders is nice just need to 3d design and print a little plug and play table for longer trips. Overall seems like a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My son love this seat I can't put it in words what life saver this car seat is. My son is autistic so he have a hard time wrapping things around but because he love the design so much, for the first time he sit in his place and doesn't remove his seatbelt. The best part he can't remove the bottom part. This a second sit I purchase for my husband car.
customer_reviews.author: Halima Juarez

customer_reviews.title: All you need
customer_reviews.text: So awesome. Better than expected!!! Comfortable and my sons head isn't flopping around when he falls asleep. Came w days earlier which is awesome as well. Thanks for the fast service and the awesome affordable product. My son was so excited
customer_reviews.author: air

customer_reviews.title: da da da da da da da da da da ... Batman!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carseat, and more importantly, so does my 5 year old! The only thing I don't really like about it is that the center clasp is on the cheap side - I wanted to swap it out with my old car seat but they aren't compatible. The cupholders are solid, unlike the snap-on ones that were on his old carseat, and the cape is a nice feature - he loves to wrap up in it like a blanket. Would definitely buy again, but am hoping they will be adding another Superhero to their lineup so we can have something different in each car.
customer_reviews.author: shopRAVE

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNCOMFORTABLE CARSEAT
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this for any child very cool yes kids love till they sit in it. kids love to buckle themselves & its impossible and hard belt to do so. Unbuckling not too bad. When you ride alone jump in car doesn't help batman scares the heck out of you. Tried to return after giving it a reasonable try assuming needed to break in but my lil guys says hurts back and neck lost $ on this, return policy is out for me. :/
customer_reviews.author: katyna

customer_reviews.title: Batman Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Batman and i git this for him when he was 4. He is now 5 and we still are able to use the car seat buckles. Maybe over summer we will use it as a booster and use the actual seat belt with it. Definitely will grow with your child. All the kids love it when they see it in our car
customer_reviews.author: Michele Fabsits

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves this thing! I hope that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves this thing! I hope that they are safe, I don't know for sure but there is a lot of padding for the head area. he doesn't use the cape. Did at first but it's more for show. One thing to mention, as a driver looking through the rear-view mirror, It looks real. It took me a couple of weeks to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hill

customer_reviews.title: but it seems to be pretty uncomfortable. If he's in it more than 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, but it seems to be pretty uncomfortable. If he's in it more than 30 minutes he's crying that his 'booty' hurts and it's always red when we get him out. We never had that issue with the car seat he was in before.
customer_reviews.author: CasMed

customer_reviews.title: It’s really not safe
customer_reviews.text: I actually don’t recommend this product. The seat is properly installed and when I turn it tilts.. I can’t put my child in this.

customer_reviews.title: Does not "TILT"
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My 2 grandson's jus love them. Only thing they don't tilt!!! Your child will fall asleep sitting up or fall ova. I would highly recommend a neck pillow or pillow
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car seat,he is 3 and he loves the cape wrapping around him,I used it in my RV and it stayed in place and he loved riding in it,And who doesn't love Batman
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome car seat my 2 year old cried when he had to get out of it!!! He loves it so much he even helped me.buckle him in... thank you for making such an awesome car seat that toddlers want to be in!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat - almost 2 years now
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for almost 2 years and it is going strong. My son loves it. So easy to install. We have taken LONG road trips and my son is very comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Everybody loves how this seat looks, including the three ...
customer_reviews.text: Everybody loves how this seat looks, including the three year old boy who it belongs to. The seat hurts my little ones butt after sleeping in it, or being in it for more than 30 minutes :( Luckily I found a small seat cushion that fits just right and usually helps. I reached out to manufacturers customer service department with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love em!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let's say I now own 2 of these batman ones... plus a mickey and a ninja turtle! I almost ended up with 3 batman ones but talked the little one into mickey instead. Kids love these. I just recently allowed my older one to use a regular seat belt instead of the harness. Downfall is the struggle to buckle these with regular seatbelt when they are side by side!
customer_reviews.author: Mama_Saurus_Rex

customer_reviews.title: Foam backing is faulty
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this cars-seat. I took it apart to wash it and the foam backing ripped, it was barley hanging on like the glue was faulty.. What am I supposed to do now? I bought this Carseat at the end of Nove,ber 2014, it is only July 25th 2015. No way it should be bad by now. I would like a replacement or something so I can safely use this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested mother approved
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and my 2 yo girl is jelouse she dosnt have her own... alithough remember you instaled it. It scared the poop out of me, when reversing my car, looked like a man in my back seat. Haha
customer_reviews.author: gena sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a year ago and am super pleased with it. We have received lots of compliments, and my grandson thinks it’s super cool. It has startled me a couple of times when I caught a glimpse of it in the rear view. Lol
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap look and feeling in person
customer_reviews.text: It looks nothing like the picture and the material looks very very cheap. process keep going up on the car seat
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat has been used for over two years by my oldest son and he lives it! Best part is,it’s easy to take apart and put back togeather. It is also very durable it has serviced dozens of washes in our washing machine!
customer_reviews.author: austin caldera

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate carseat for your superhero!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson and he LOVES it. If your child loves batman this is the premium design! As for safety it makes the cut. If you have the opportunity to purchase , I would suggest getting it..you wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovetoshop

customer_reviews.title: Great care seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my 4 year old Grandson in his seat! He hates car seats and it was a battle to keep him in one. Tried everything, yes, even tried the car doesn't move unless you are buckled in Some where between point A and point B he would unbuckle himself. This worked. He loves this car seat, doesn't mind being buckled in and loves to wrap the cape around him. Thank you KidsEmbrace!
customer_reviews.author: Mamasue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved Batman, so when she died we got this for our grandson who loves it as she would have. Just a side note, when you leave it in the car and walk out to start it. Don’t be alarmed someone isn’t sitting in you car, it’s just Batman.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn B.

customer_reviews.title: My son in law couldn’t wait to put it in his truck!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Still a bit big for my grandson but he’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: SilverRayne

customer_reviews.title: Safe and So Fun
customer_reviews.text: This carseat feels very sturdy and safe. My 5yo LOVES it. It's built well, and even has a cape that wraps around the kid sitting in it. I feel like my kid is safer being held by Batman.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely  LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I had been debating on buying this carseat for my son for about a year now. I am so glad I did! The carseat is bigger then I ever imagined, that being said, I feel better knowing he is going to be safe in it. I had no issues with putting it together and my son will be able to continue to use it from now until he doesn't need to anymore at all. Plus, he LIVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Charity Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but difficult
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but very hard to un buckle. It takes a few minutes every time to get it off!!! Not sure if mine is defective but I don't think it's safe if there's an emergency and I can't get my kid out
customer_reviews.author: sinfulcrystal

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Has great safety reviews and th 6 yr old doesn't complain being in a 5 point harness still. Has the definite cool factor. We have 3 of these. 1 for each car he might ride in.
customer_reviews.author: kathi echelberger

customer_reviews.title: Very COOL car seat.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely LOVES this car seat. He is 21 months and greets Batman every time he get in the seat.the safety ratings make me feel confident in the product and it does feel solid. We don't go for much long drives so he has not complained about his bum hurting like some other reviews. My son still wears diapers so maybe that is why.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: It’s Great! We’ve been wanting this since our grandson was born! (he’s now 3). It exceeded our expectations. I will say it startles us when driving without our grandson in the car seat, you look back there...Batman looks damn near lifelike! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: R H.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty strap for latch system
customer_reviews.text: The strap that connects the connectors to the carseat ripped so now I can't connect it to the latch system.
customer_reviews.author: timothy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Our grandsons love their Batman Car seats. They can’t wait to go with us so they can sit in them. These seats also look and feel more stable in the car compared to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: totally cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these seats one batman and one ninja turtles. I gave them to my kids for Christmas and they absolutely love them! !! I love them too super cool looking and does the job. The only thing I want to say is these are wide seats. I used to have my two car seats side by side my oldest near the door and baby in the middle but these seats cant sit side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old son LOVES this seat, it ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son LOVES this seat, it actually makes him excited to get into the car even when he is not wanting to leave somewhere! However, the seat is not the easiest to install, and it is difficult to get a tight fit with the latch system but not impossible. I would still buy again!
customer_reviews.author: andrewlangton91

customer_reviews.title: Always put my baby to sleep 😴
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3-year-old son he loves it. He don't play with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Renita baker

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Had issues with keeping 4 yr old in a car seat. Kept getting his way out. Spent more and he LOVES it. This is his. No problems since getting this car seat. Easy to assemble and has the addition of a built in blanket for the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: mean grandma

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it! One choose batman and the other one ...

customer_reviews.title: straps don't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: the straps do not stay tight, the chest clip kept ending up down to my sons stomach and he wasn't even touching it. this carseat is NOT safe. I think the good reviews are based on the cool design, but I prefer safety!

customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with this seat.Very funny that when people walk by my car they double take,because of the flesh tone face.Everyone thinks it is another person which comes in handy for safety reasons when we are away from the car.

customer_reviews.title: It's cool and can take a hit
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson. 3 months later my daughter-in-law totaled the car with him in this seat. Not a scratch on him from the seat. It's cool and can take a hit. I hope we can afford to buy her new one now as once car seats are in an accident the must be disposed of. I recommend this car seat!

customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandson to put in our side by side 4 wheeler. Love the cape to keep the dirt off him and the extra cup holders are great. Like that we can adjust straps for when he gets bigger. My nephew that is 3 and my niece that is 5 both fit in it comfortably. Plus it's Batman!!

product_meta.title: KidsEmbrace 2-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat, DC Comics Batman
product_meta.description: Style:BatmanYour child will love hopping into the car knowing Batman is along for the ride! The KidsEmbrace DC Comics Batman 2-in-1 Booster Car Seat has been rigorously tested and exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213), plus it was given a "Best Bet" rating by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety. Great for toddlers and older kids alike, this combination booster car seat is approved for forward-facing use with the five-point harness for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height, and it can be converted into a belt-positioning booster car seat for boys and girls between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height. The booster seat harness straps are easy to adjust with one hand. The crotch belt can be used in two different positions to accommodate your growing child, and the headrest can be adjusted to three different heights. The headrest also features energy-absorbing EPS foam for maximum side-impact protection. The contoured seat is comfortable for long rides, and the cushioned seat cover is machine-washable for easy cleaning. Two cup holders provide a handy place for drinks, snacks, or toys, and Batman's cape can be removed for use as a blanket. The combination five-point harness high-back booster car seat is easy to install with or without LATCH and the top tether. It measures 19-1/2 by 19 by 29-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest down) to 19-1/2 by 19 by to 32-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest up), and it weighs 15 pounds.
feature_bullets: 5-POINT HARNESS SECURITY: Two position points at each shoulder, two position points at the child's hips, and one point where the harness buckles between the legs to give your child the best possible protection
3-HARNESS POSITION: There are three slots to position the harness shoulder straps depending on the age and height of your child. Shoulder straps should be at or just above the shoulders

TWO MODE OPTIONS: Forward-facing five-point harness car seat is made for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height. Convert to a belt-positioning booster seat for older kids between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height
SAFETY CERTIFICATIONS: Insurance Institute for Highway Safety "Best Bet" rating for booster car seats; exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213)
ADDED COMFORT: Three-position adjustable height headrest is equipped with energy-absorbing EPS foam. Two cup holders provide added convenience to hold drinks or store treats and small trinkets
